title: Is France a shadow of its former self? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bad question. Depends on which period you are comparing to today. One can generalize to say that before the defeat in the Franco-Prussian War and carnage of WW1 there were still elements of La Gloire visible, at least in popular culture and recollections of old soldiers. Mass-murder by mechanized warfare erased the last vestiges.

Yes, it does not have the level of intellectual capacity it used to have in its culture. All of that has gone, being superseded by fast food thinking in all areas so the whole culture is suffering and the worst of it is that people do not know it.
